text: læa meux rea hı mnusʹy lim rs khwam metta hlangcak phyantray di prasb kæ phwk khea dangnan phwk khea k mi xubay tx xongkar tang «khxng rea cng klaw theid muhammad “xallxh thrng rwdrew ying nı kar kæ xubay” thæcring brrda ma la xik ah khxng rea caban thuk sing thi phwk than kalang tha xubay xyu
